text: Manipur Polo International 2017 or 11th Manipur International Polo Tournament is a Polo Tournament that was held in Imphal, Manipur. It was organised in Mapal Kangjeibung (Imphal Polo Ground), the oldest polo ground in the world. India-B team (Manipur team) won the trophy after defeating Argentina by 7-6 goals. == Participants == * * * * * == References == Category:Polo competitions in Manipur Category:2017 in sports Category:2010s in Indian sport
title: Manipur Polo International 2017
